fullDescription.intro:
This node reads in .wav files. For each channel in the .wav file the node creates an output column where the channel signal is stored.
The sample rate is available from the flow variable, the unit is in Hz.
This node is part of the DSP Extensions provided by AI.Associates GmbH, Germany. For more information please refer to https://ai.associates/knime or write an email to knime@ai.associates.

ports.outPort: A table with the signals from the .wav file channels stored in separate columns.
